Class SpiderWebContest

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    Resolve the marathon problem and use SpiderWeb to simulate.

    • Method Detail

      • solve

        public static int[] solve​(int strands,
                          int favorite,
                          int[][] bridges)
        Parameters:
        strands - The total number of strands in the spider web.
        favorite - The index of the spider's favorite spot on the web.
        bridges - A 2D array representing the connections between spots on the web. Each element is an array of two integers representing the indices of the spots connected by a bridge.
        Returns:
        the minimum number of strands to add to reach the spot

      • simulate

        public static void simulate​(int strands,
                            int favorite,
                            int[][] bridges,
                            int strand)
        Simulate the solution of the problem
        Parameters:
        strands - The total number of strands in the spider web.
        favorite - The index of the spider's favorite spot on the web.
        bridges - A 2D array representing the connections between spots on the web. Each element is an array of two integers representing the indices of the spots connected by a bridge.
        strand - The strand where the spider starts to walk
